code: export function CreateVariant(variant){return{type:"CREATE_MEDIA_TEXT",data:variant};}export function DeleteAll(){return{type:"DELETE_ALL_MEDIA_TEXT"};}export function EditVariant(index,editorData){return{type:"EDIT_MEDIA_TEXT",data:{index:index,body:editorData.body,textState:editorData.textState}};}export function DeleteVariant(id){return{type:"DELETE_MEDIA_TEXT",data:id};}export function SetMediaPath(path){return{type:"SET_MEDIA_PATH",data:path};}export function SetMediaType(path){return{type:"SET_MEDIA_TYPE",data:path};}export function SetActiveVariant(id){return{type:"SET_MEDIA_TEXT_ACTIVE",data:id};}
